name: The thermal
description:
this is a project based on global warming, and to raise awareness of it, using gb studio as my engine, and uses gameboy controls.  It says "potato inc" cause thats a running joke I have, so not serious at all.

to start press a (z)

(also I may have made it so that for some of the locals you needa click 'a'' to interact with them)

controls:

arrows/wasd - movement

a (z) - special ability 1

b(x) - special ability  2

no pause yet

select(shift) - lives left
